script.line: Okay!
Here's your...uh...
I guess I would call this...
Oooooh!
Yeah! Not, uh... not bad. But I guess I'm not the judge, right?
Nope. This one's all Minty. I guess I'll just take it and--
Prota! Look over there! The door!
What's--! Minty?! Minty, it's you!
Woof!
Minty, I'm so glad to see you! Come here, girl! I've got a sandwich for--
(MUNCH)
Aaaah! She took the sandwich!
Quick! Grab her before she's....
...gone.
Noooo!
Wow! That's the fastest I ever seen a dog move!

then.line: ...And she dropped the sandwich.
Right next to the trash can.
Guess she thinks that's where it belongs.
Ugh! This is terrible. She hated the sandwich AND she's gone!
I've messed up again...
Eh, you didn't mess up. Sandwiches are subjective.
Sub-jective. Huh. Could be a good name for my Festi-Ball project.
I've really gotta get after her. You didn't happen to see which way she went, did you Doc?
Hm. I know she went left, but... That's about as far as I got.
Maybe you head over that way and see if you can't track her down?
Yeah... I guess that's all I can do.
You know. Maybe this is a little ridiculous, but... that's the same direction as the Ball Museum.
She didn't like your sandwich, but I don't know a single dog who doesn't like a ball!
Hm. Interesting.
Minty! Come back!
She seems to like the sandwich at least! I'll take that.
But now she's gone again! What am I gonna do without bait?!
Maybe-- maybe we could make another sandwich? A... dessert sandwich?
First of all, dessert sandwich? Amazing idea. You're a little genius.
But second? Maybe you need a different kind of bait.
Like what?
Hmmm...
Well, uh, dogs like balls, right?
Minty certainly does!
Then how about the Ball Museum?
Hmmm. Interesting...
But she took that classic sandwich down in one bite! I'm impressed.
Guess the bait worked.
But now she's gone again!
I mean, after downing a sandwich like that, she probably wants to get a little exercise in!
Exercise?
Yeah, you know. Like, uh... cardio. For dogs. Fetch or whatever. Listen I'm a medical doctor not a vet.
Oh! Right! Yeah, she does love fetch... she's playing it with my heart right now!
Much better to play with a ball if you ask me! But-- hey!
What?
Maybe Minty's off to play fetch with some new balls!
The Ball Museum!
Exactly! That's the direction she was headed in too!
Oh!

script.line: Okay! I'm gonna go and check the Ball Museum!
Watch out, though, I think it might be closed 'til tonight!
Don't worry! I've got a friend who works there. I'm sure it'll be okay.
Ha! Seems you got friends all over town, huh?
I do! Which reminds me: thanks a lot for your help. And the free sandwich.
Eh, don't worry about it, Prota! You're a swell kid and I'm happy to help.
Plus, you gave me some great ideas for my sandwich tonight! It's win-win!
I'm glad! Now I gotta run! I'll see you at the Festi-Ball!
Take care, Prota!
